original_text:
Dionysus Golden Feast
Free Spins, simboli appiccicosi, Wild moltiplicatori, sono solo alcuni dei Bonus che puoi trovare in Dionysus Golden Feast, la slot che celebra il dio Dioniso!
Cosa aspettarci da Dionysus Golden Feast
Dio greco dell’estasi, del vino e più in generale del divertimento sfrenato, Dioniso è forse una delle divinità più famose della mitologia. La Thunderkick celebra al meglio questa figura con una slot ambientata nella dimora del dio, in una terrazza incantevole con le colonne da cui pendono grossi grappoli d’uva. Il colore predominante è il viola, un richiamo al vino con cui brinderemo un attimo prima di apprestarci a giocare con i Free Spins.
In generale, la grafica di Dionysus Golden Feast è molto ricercata, i simboli sono ben disegnati e ricchi di dettagli, i tasti sono disposti al meglio sulla schermata rendendo agevole le giocate.
Menzione a parte merita il comparto sonoro, una musica rilassante che rilassa durante gli Spins.
Caratteristiche della slot
Diamo ora qualche informazione su questa slot dal gameplay semplice che cattura sin dal primo Spin. La griglia di gioco ha 5 bobine e 3 righe su cui trovano posto 15 paylines fisse.
La scommessa minima per Spin è di 0,10 €, con una vincita potenziale di 7.500x la puntata. Per ottenere una combo pagante è necessario atterrino almeno tre simboli adiacenti a partire dal primo rullo a sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Con l’Autoplay si può impostare un numero variabile di giri automatici che possono essere fermati in ogni momento.
La volatilità è alta, il ritorno teorico al giocatore si attesta su un buon 96,16%.
Simboli regolari e speciali
Di sicuro il piatto più succulento del gioco è il sistema di Bonus che può regalare vincite molto interessanti. Prima però vogliamo soffermarci sui simboli e sul loro valore. Come nella stragrande maggioranza delle slot, anche qui troviamo le carte da gioco dal nove all’asso, simboli poco redditizi. Per cominciare a ottenere somme di un certo livello è necessario ottenere qualche combo formata con la coppa di frutta, l’arpa, la cornucopia e naturalmente Dioniso.
Vediamo ora i simboli speciali, cominciando dal Wild, qui rappresentato dal vaso d’oro: oltre a ricoprire la funzione di Jolly e sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto gli Scatter, ogni volta che compare almeno tre volte ci ripaga quanto il simbolo base più remunerativo, ossia Dionisio. Un’altra funzione del Wild è quella di regalare sempre un moltiplicatore il cui valore varia in base al numero. Per esempio, 2x con un solo Jolly, 4x con due e così via sino al moltiplicatore x32 se sulla griglia ne atterrano 5.
La maschera d’oro è il nostro Scatter. Quando compare, prima si trasformerà in un simbolo pagante, poi trasformerà in quello stesso simbolo tutti quelli adiacenti. Inoltre, darà avvio a un Respin durante il quale i simboli mutati rimarranno appiccicati sui rulli.
Altro Scatter è la maschera d’argento che insieme a quella d’oro attiva la funzione Free Spins che vedrà atterrare sulla griglia un alto numero di maschere e di Wild moltiplicatori. Questa funzione può essere acquistata pagano 85 volte la puntata.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è il range di scommessa di Dionysus Golden Feast?

Si possono puntare da 0,10 € sino a un massimo di 100.



Qual è la vincita massima per questa slot?

Si può vincere sino a 7.500 volte la puntata.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Dionysus Golden Feast?

Il valore RTP del 96,16%

raw_translation.response:
Dionysus Golden Feast
Free Spins, sticky symbols, Wild multipliers - these are just a few of the bonuses you can find in Dionysus Golden Feast, the slot game celebrating the God of Wine himself!
What to expect from Dionysus Golden Feast
Dionysus, the Greek God of ecstasy, wine, and unrestrained fun, is perhaps one of the most famous deities in mythology. Thunderkick pays homage to his greatness with a stunning slot game set in his divine abode, a beautiful terrace adorned with columns from which grape clusters hang. Purple dominates the color scheme, a nod to the wine we'll be toasting to before we start playing with the Free Spins.
Overall, the graphics of Dionysus Golden Feast are carefully crafted, with symbols that are well-designed and full of detail, and buttons arranged efficiently on the screen to make gameplay easy.
The sound quality is worth mentioning with relaxing music that soothes during the spins.
Features of the slot
Now let's talk about the uncomplicated gameplay of this slot that captures your attention from the first spin. The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows where 15 fixed paylines are in place.
The minimum bet per spin is €0.10 with a potential win of up to 7,500x the bet. To get a winning combination, you must land at least three adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and progressing towards the right.
You can set a variable number of automatic spins with Autoplay which can be stopped at any time.
The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player rate stands at a decent 96.16%.
Regular and special symbols
Undoubtedly, the most delicious dish of this game is the bonus system that can give you very interesting winnings. But first, let's focus on the regular symbols and their value. As in the vast majority of slot games, you'll find the playing card symbols from nine to ace, which are less profitable. To start getting higher payouts, you need to score some combinations with the fruit bowl, harp, cornucopia, and of course, Dionysus himself.
Now let's take a look at the special symbols, starting with the Wild symbol, represented by the golden vase. In addition to serving as a wild symbol and replacing all symbols except for the Scatter, every time it appears at least three times, it pays us back as much as the highest-paying symbol, which is Dionysus himself. Another function of the Wild is to always give a multiplier, varying in value depending on the number. For example, a 2x multiplier with one Wild, 4x with two, and so on up to a multiplier of x32 if you land five of them on the grid.
The golden mask is our Scatter. When it appears, it first transforms into a paying symbol, then transforms all adjacent symbols into that same symbol. Moreover, it triggers a Respin during which the altered symbols remain sticky on the reels.
The silver mask is another Scatter that, together with the golden mask, activates the Free Spins feature that brings a high number of masks and Wild multipliers to the grid. You can purchase this feature by paying 85 times your bet.

FAQs
What is the betting range for Dionysus Golden Feast?

You can bet from €0.10 up to a maximum of €100.

What is the maximum payout for this slot?

You can win up to 7,500 times your bet.

What is the theoretical return to player rate for Dionysus Golden Feast?

The RTP value is 96.16%.

Thunderkick pays homage to his greatness with a stunning slot game set in his divine abode, a beautiful terrace adorned with columns from which grape clusters hang. Purple dominates the color scheme, a nod to the wine we'll be toasting to before we start playing with the Free Spins.
Overall, the graphics of Dionysus Golden Feast are carefully crafted, with symbols that are well-designed and full of detail, and buttons arranged efficiently on the screen to make gameplay easy.
The sound quality is worth mentioning with relaxing music that soothes during the spins.
Features of the slot
Now let's talk about the uncomplicated gameplay of this slot that captures your attention from the first spin. The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows where 15 fixed paylines are in place.
The minimum bet per spin is €0.10 with a potential win of up to 7,500x the bet. To get a winning combination, you must land at least three adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and progressing towards the right.
You can set a variable number of automatic spins with Autoplay which can be stopped at any time.
The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player rate stands at a decent 96.16%.
Regular and special symbols
Undoubtedly, the most delicious dish of this game is the bonus system that can give you very interesting winnings. But first, let's focus on the regular symbols and their value. To start getting higher payouts, you need to score some combinations with the fruit bowl, harp, cornucopia, and of course, Dionysus himself.
Now let's take a look at the special symbols, starting with the Wild symbol, represented by the golden vase. In addition to serving as a wild symbol and replacing all symbols except for the Scatter, every time it appears at least three times, it pays us back as much as the highest-paying symbol, which is Dionysus himself. Another function of the Wild is to always give a multiplier, varying in value depending on the number. For example, a 2x multiplier with one Wild, 4x with two, and so on up to a multiplier of x32 if you land five of them on the grid.
The golden mask is our Scatter. When it appears, it first transforms into a paying symbol, then transforms all adjacent symbols into that same symbol. Moreover, it triggers a Respin during which the altered symbols remain sticky on the reels.
The silver mask is another Scatter that, together with the golden mask, activates the Free Spins feature that brings a high number of masks and Wild multipliers to the grid. You can purchase this feature by paying 85 times your bet.

To start getting higher payouts, you need to score some combinations with the fruit bowl, harp, cornucopia, and of course, Dionysus himself.
Now let's take a look at the special symbols, starting with the Wild symbol, represented by the golden vase. In addition to serving as a wild symbol and replacing all symbols except for the Scatter, every time it appears at least three times, it pays us back as much as the highest-paying symbol, which is Dionysus himself. Another function of the Wild is to always give a multiplier, varying in value depending on the number. For example, a 2x multiplier with one Wild, 4x with two, and so on up to a multiplier of x32 if you land five of them on the grid.
The golden mask is our Scatter. When it appears, it first transforms into a paying symbol, then transforms all adjacent symbols into that same symbol. Moreover, it triggers a Respin during which the altered symbols remain sticky on the reels.
The silver mask is another Scatter that, together with the golden mask, activates the Free Spins feature that brings a high number of masks and Wild multipliers to the grid. You can purchase this feature by paying 85 times your bet.

FAQs
What is the betting range for Dionysus Golden Feast?

You can bet from €0.10 up to a maximum of €100.

What is the maximum payout for this slot?

You can win up to 7,500 times your bet.

What is the theoretical return to player rate for Dionysus Golden Feast?

The RTP value is 96.16%.
